definitions.text: a human female employed to do housework
examples: the char will clean the carpet
I have a woman who comes in four hours a day while I write

definitions.text: any of several small trout-like fish of the genus Salvelinus

examples: Without a drenching rain, the forest fire will char everything

definitions.text: burn slightly and superficially so as to affect color
examples: The cook blackened the chicken breast
The fire charred the ceiling above the mantelpiece
